org.eclipse.hawkbit.swupdatable:Software.description: Represents the ability of a device to install and manage a certain type of software.

statusProperties.name: softwareModuleType
statusProperties.description: The type of the software managed by this feature.

statusProperties.name: installedDependencies
statusProperties.description: List of all installed software managed by this feature. The key should be the concatenated group.name:version.

statusProperties.name: contextDependencies
statusProperties.description: Information additional dependencies relevant for software installation, e.g. hardware parts or runtimes like OSGi container or JREs.

statusProperties.name: lastFailedOperation
statusProperties.description: The last operation status indicating a finished with error.

operations.name: cancel
operations.description: Try to cancel a running installation.

operations.name: cancelRemove
operations.description: Try to cancel a remove operation.

org.eclipse.hawkbit:OperationStatus:2.0..description: Entity representing the status of an operation (install/remove) called on a device.

properties.name: correlationId
properties.description: Id used for correlating the status-update with the operation called before.

properties.name: status
properties.description: One of the predefined status, representing the failure, progress or success of the operation.

properties.name: softwareModule
properties.description: Required in the case of an install/download/cancel operation, absent in case of remove or cancelRemove.

properties.name: software
properties.description: Required for a remove or cancelRemove operation, absent in case of install/download/cancel.

properties.name: progress
properties.description: A progress indicator in percentage.

properties.name: message
properties.description: Message from the device to give more context to the transmitted status.

properties.name: statusCode
properties.description: Custom status code transmitted by the device.

org.eclipse.hawkbit:Protocol:2.0.0.description: Protocol provided for downloading an artifact

org.eclipse.hawkbit:DependencyDescriptio.description: Describes a software installed on the device.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the software.

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version of the software.

properties.name: filename
properties.description: Filename of the software module artifact.

properties.name: download
properties.description: Urls to download the artifact.

properties.name: checksums
properties.description: Checksum values for checksum urls.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Artifact size.

org.eclipse.hawkbit:SoftwareUpdateAction.description: Parameter used for instructing the device to install or download one or more software.

properties.name: correlationId
properties.description: An identifier used to correlate the status updates sent from the device for this action.

properties.name: softwareModules
properties.description: Software modules that needs to be processed.

properties.name: weight
properties.description: Priority in case of multiple, parallel installation instructions.

properties.name: metadata
properties.description: Any other information which should be passed to the device.

properties.name: forced
properties.description: Indicates the urgency of the update. when true, the device should install as soon as possible.

org.eclipse.hawkbit:SoftwareModuleAction.description: Parameter representing a software module - a collection of artifacts to be downloaded and installed

properties.name: softwareModule
properties.description: A unique identifier for the software module.

properties.name: artifacts
properties.description: List of software artifacts contained in the module. In case of a cancel request, this will not be provided.

properties.name: metadata
properties.description: Any other information which should be passed to the device.

literals.name: STARTED
literals.description: Confirmation that the request is received.

literals.name: DOWNLOADING_WAITING
literals.description: In the state of downloading, but waiting for another operation to complete. Ex: user confirmation.

literals.name: INSTALLING_WAITING
literals.description: In the state of installing, but waiting for another operation to complete. Ex: user confirmation, completion of another software etc.

literals.name: REMOVING
literals.description: Software is in the progress of being removed

literals.name: REMOVING_WAITING
literals.description: Software remove is waiting for some conditions, e.g. user-confirmation

literals.name: REMOVED
literals.description: Software part has been removed - final success of all removals should report FINISHED_SUCCESS

literals.name: CANCELING_WAITING
literals.description: Cancel is waiting. Ex: user confirmation.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name for the software module.

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version of the software module.

org.eclipse.vorto:Unit:1.0.1.description: SI units plus some common imperial units

properties.name: url
properties.description: Url to download the artifact.

properties.name: md5url
properties.description: Url to download the MD5SUM file.

org.eclipse.hawkbit:DependencyDescriptio.description: Describes an installed software or other dependencies for a device.

properties.name: group
properties.description: Group name (e.g. vendor). This should be unique together with name.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the software or hardware part.

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version or value uniquely identifying the software or hardware.

properties.name: type
properties.description: An additional classification type, e.g. hw-part, docker, etc.

org.eclipse.hawkbit:SoftwareRemoveAction.description: Action instructing the device to remove a defined set of software.

properties.name: correlationId
properties.description: An identifier used to correlate the status updates sent from the device for this action.

properties.name: software
properties.description: Software to be removed.

properties.name: weight
properties.description: Priority in case of multiple, parallel instructions.

properties.name: metadata
properties.description: MetaData associated with Eclipse hawkBit's Distribution Set.

properties.name: forced
properties.description: Indicates the urgency of the software removal, when true the device should remove the software as soon as possible.
